## Bandit Issue Example: Partial Executable Path

```none
>> Issue: Starting a process with a partial executable path
Severity: Low   Confidence: High
```

## Advanced Bandit Usage with Filtering and Context

```bash
bandit examples/*.py -n 3 --severity-level=high
```

## Advanced Bandit Usage with Filtering and Context

```bash
bandit examples/*.py -n 3 -lll
```

## Advanced Bandit Usage with Filtering and Context

```bash
bandit examples/*.py -p ShellInjection
```

## Bandit B112: Example Issue Output

```text
>> Issue: Try, Except, Continue detected.
   Severity: Low   Confidence: High
   CWE: CWE-703 (https://cwe.mitre.org/data/definitions/703.html)
   Location: ./examples/try_except_continue.py:5
4            a = i
5        except:
6            continue
```

## Specify a Baseline Report for Bandit

```console
bandit -b BASELINE
```

## Install Bandit with Baseline CLI Support

```console
pip install bandit[baseline]
```

## Install Bandit with SARIF Output Support

```console
pip install bandit[sarif]
```
